Class ServerController

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerController

        public ServerController(boolean load)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Constructor of the class Server Controller. It receive a parameter that indicate if the game has to be load from file. If not it initialize all as new, otherwise it load the previous network manger and disconnect all the tokens of all the game. Doing so every player that was previously in the game will be reconnected as the log again and the game will be "re started" from the point it was only when every previous player is reconnected
        Parameters:
        load - boolean indicating if the game has to be load
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

    • Method Detail

      • createPlayer

        public void createPlayer(java.lang.String token,
                         int gameId,
                         java.lang.String username,
                         PlayerColor color)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Invoke the method create player from network manager and retrieve information about the game sending info to every other player joined to that game
        Specified by:
        createPlayer in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        token - the token of the player requesting the creation
        gameId - the game to join
        username - the username requested
        color - the color requested
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • quit

        public void quit(java.lang.String token)
        Method to quit a player. It sends messages to every other player joined to that game to notify them of the quit or to quit the game beacuse of lack of players
        Specified by:
        quit in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        token - the player to quit

      • wake

        public void wake(java.lang.String token)
        Method to reconnect a user that was previously disconnected cause of inactivity. It restores the player in the right data structures of NetworkManager
        Specified by:
        wake in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        token - the token of the player to wake

      • getMapInfo

        public void getMapInfo(java.lang.String token,
                       int gameId,
                       int map)
        Method to send to a client the requested map for a join. If that map not exists or the game is already started or ended player is not allowed to join that game
        Specified by:
        getMapInfo in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        token - the player that has done the request
        gameId - the game id to join

      • getAlreadyLoggedUser

        public void getAlreadyLoggedUser(ViewListener viewListener,
                                 java.lang.String alreadyExistingToken)
        Check if a given token corresponds to a disconnected player. If so reconnect that user to that game sending him all updated information, otherwise give negative answer
        Specified by:
        getAlreadyLoggedUser in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
